abstract: Illinois legislative session ends with difficult issues, like budget deficit and tax increases and business regulations, unresolved.
lead_paragraph: The state has a new budget, but with a shortfall, and while lawmakers said they would keep meeting as needed, there was little hope for a deal.

headline.main: Illinois Legislative Session Ends, but Battles Over Deficit and Taxes Are Only Beginning
headline.print_headline: Illinois Legislative Session Ends, but Battles Over Deficit and Taxes Are Only Beginning

snippet: The state has a new budget, but with a shortfall, and while lawmakers said they would keep meeting as needed, there was little hope for a deal.
